poem:
Title: Errors of Interpretations

So much depends  
upon  
a construed  
phrase, 

redrafted with careful  
rectitude,
unmade in the
unseeable columns of print. 

Kidney beans 
and mushroom stew  
lacking the heat  
of understanding, 
a nation's budget awry 
in a soldier's gun. 

Observe -  
the truth 
simply in its 
plainest form,  
in the details,
always  
in the missing  
details.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Corrections and clarifications • An article said Russia “has thrown 40% of its production capacity into rearmament”; we meant to say 40% of its government budget (Trump’s Nato declaration a wake-up call for European leaders, 17 February, p37, early editions). • In Feast, a recipe for herby mushroom and kidney bean stew (Hot stews for cold days, 27 January, p8) omitted to say that the kidney beans should be boiled for at least 10 minutes". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Corrections and clarifications • An article said Russia “has thrown 40% of its production capacity into rearmament”; we meant to say 40% of its government budget (Trump’s Nato declaration a wake-up call for European leaders, 17 February, p37, early editions). • In Feast, a recipe for herby mushroom and kidney bean stew (Hot stews for cold days, 27 January, p8) omitted to say that the kidney beans should be boiled for at least 10 minutes
